get.description: Returns a specific authorization operation associated with the payment charge

parameters.description: The merchant identifier.
parameters.name: Merchant-Id

parameters.description: Optional unique request reference to facilitate debugging.
parameters.name: Request-Reference

409.description: Duplicate request received with the same idempotency key.

504.description: Call to the upstream dependency timed out.

street.description: Street name, house number and other details such as apartment number or door number

paymentMethod.description: The payment method which should be used to process the payment charge. Must be uppercase.

paymentDescriptor.description: The payment descriptor (arbitrary string). May be presented to the consumer.

instrumentId.description: The identifier of an existing payment instrument. Instruments are used for account on file payments.

merchantPaymentChargeReference.description: The merchant payment charge reference. Aka, Transaction Reference.

autoCapture.description: Indicates whether the payment charge should be automatically captured after a successful authorization.

webhooksUrl.description: The URL to which the payment charge state changes will be notified

debitMandateId.description: The reference id for a mandate that allows debit charges on the bank account.

ip.description: The IP address of the client

country.description: 2-letter ISO code of the country where the payment instrument or account has been issued or established (for example GB, US, DE).

locale.description: The locale describing the preferred language of the consumer

taxIdentification.description: The consumer tax identification (Social security identification) eg.: CPF in Brazil, NISS in Portugal, etc.

IndustryData.description: The list of industry specific data.

InstallmentPlan.description: Describes the financing details chosen by the consumer for this order

numberOfInstallments.description: The number of installments the consumer will split the payment into.

InstrumentValidation.description: If included, PPRO will try to validate the instrument with a nominal-amount authorization. If validation fails, the instrument creation request will fail

value.description: The amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

verificationCode.description: Code generated to authenticate the user.

industryData.description: The list of industry specific data.

orderReferenceNumber.description: The merchant's internal order reference (if different from merchantPaymentChargeReference)

totalTaxAmount.description: The total tax value paid by the consumer for the order (in same currency units as specified by amount.currency)

amount.description: The amount to pay for each individual item in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

PaymentInstrument.description: The payment instrument. This field is required for a subset of PPRO's supported payment methods.

returnUrl.description: The page where the consumer should be redirected to after the payment succeeds.

scanBy.description: Custom expiry date in ISO 8601 format.

last4Digits.description: The last 4 digits of the card

mobileIntentUri.description: Intent URI to be used for app-to-app mobile flows.

AuthenticationMethod.description: The available authentication methods for the authorization.

GatewayProcessingFailureResponse.description: The void processing failure if the void operation failed.

amount.description: The authorization amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

createdAt.description: The authorization creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The authorization update timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

amount.description: The capture amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

createdAt.description: The capture creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The capture update timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

example.refundDescriptor: Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789

amount.description: The refund amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

refundDescriptor.description: The refund descriptor (arbitrary string). To provide consumer's bank account details
refundDescriptor.example: Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789

createdAt.description: The refund creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The refund update timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

refunds.refundDescriptor: Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789
Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789

paymentMethod.description: The payment method which was used to process the payment charge.

instrumentId.description: The payment instrument identifier associated with the payment charge.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter code of the payment charge currency.

authenticationMethods.description: The available authentication methods for the authorization.

createdAt.description: The payment charge creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The payment charge update timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

amount.description: The void amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

createdAt.description: The void creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The void update timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

requestUrl.description: The URL where the consumer should be redirected in order to authenticate the payment.

codeImage.description: An already-rendered Scan Code image for ease of integration.

codePayload.description: The Scan Code payload to construct the image on the partner side.

codeDocument.description: The url to a pdf/html payslip document.

scanBy.description: The custom expiry timestamp for paying in ISO 8601 format.

amount.description: The void amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

example.refundDescriptor: Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789

amount.description: The refund amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

refundDescriptor.description: The refund descriptor (arbitrary string). To provide consumer's bank account details
refundDescriptor.example: Name: Jamie Shopper CPF:12345678909 Bank Name: Scotland Bank Agency Number: 1234 Account Number: 123456789

amount.description: The capture amount in the payment charge currency's smallest unit.

AuthenticationResult.description: The outcome of processing the payment authentication challenge (eg: a payment provider generated token or a 3DS challenge response).

additionalProperties.description: A map containing the authentication result details which format is understood by the payment processor of the associated payment method

details.description: A map containing the authentication result details which format is understood by the payment processor of the associated payment method

RawCardInstrument_allOf_validate.description: If included, PPRO will try to validate the instrument with a nominal-amount authorization. If validation fails, the instrument creation request will fail
